Name: Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl
Description: Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl is a viral disease that affects tomato plants, causing the leaves to turn yellow and curl upwards. The virus is primarily spread by the silverleaf whitefly, which is a common pest in warm and humid regions. Unfortunately, there is no cure for Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl virus, and infected plants should be removed to prevent the spread of the disease.
